episodes.title: Luffy Umi ni Shisu!? Kaizoku Doumei Houkai
episodes.plot: Breed reveals his intentions. Breed commands Luffy and Law to fight each other in a stadium-like place, while Dugong begs him to make them stop.

episodes.title: Daigyakuten! Sakuretsu Luffy Ikari no Tekken
episodes.plot: Chopper and the dugong make an attempt to go against Breed, but Breed orders the other animals to attack them. At that point Law, Caesar and Luffy enter the room and Luffy knocks the animals out.

episodes.title: Gekishin! Shinsekai Ugokasu Dai News
episodes.plot: The world learns about Doflamingo's sudden resignation from the Shichibukai. Law explains his plan for the destruction of the factory. Meanwhile, Buggy is revealed to have become a Shichibukai during the time-skip.

episodes.title: Bouken! Ai to Jounetsu no Kuni Dressrosa
episodes.plot: The Straw Hat Pirates, Law, Kin'emon and Momonosuke arrive at Dressrosa. There they divide into 3 groups. A mysterious blind man appears.

episodes.title: Nekkyou Uzumaku: Corrida Colosseum
episodes.plot: After the blind man departs, the people in the bar start exclaiming over missing possessions, among which is Zoro's Shusui, the treasure of Wano Country.

episodes.title: Kiken na Koi: Odoriko Violet
episodes.plot: As Zoro searches for his missing katana, Sanji finds himself meeting a beautiful and stunning dancer named Violet who requires the services of Sanji in a dire matter.

episodes.title: Saikyou no Mumei Senshi! Lucy Toujou
episodes.plot: Luffy signs up for the tournament, and Franky requests him to not let anyone discover who he is. Meanwhile, Sanji is seen with Violet, wandering around Dressrosa.

episodes.title: Kaizoku Kikoushi Cavendish
episodes.plot: The famous beautiful pirate Cavendish makes an entrance and proceeds to explain to Luffy (not realizing his identity) the rules of entertainment in the Colosseum.

episodes.title: Unmei no Saikai: Hyena no Bellamy
episodes.plot: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy. Meanwhile, the Caesar handover team learn about Green Bit, and on the Sunny, the four who remained to watch the ship hear noises from inside.

episodes.title: Choushinsei! Hitokui no Bartolomeo
episodes.plot: The Block B battle begins. Bartolomeo is heckled by the crowd as he enters the colosseum. Cavendish tells Luffy about the competitors and reveals why he hates the new super rookies.

episodes.title: Gun'yuu Kakkyo! Hakunetsu no B Block!
episodes.plot: Seeing that his true identity is exposed, Luffy tries to defend himself from Chinjao's devastating headbutts and Cavendish's irrational hatred while trying in vain to convince them he's "Lucy"

episodes.title: Ichigeki Hissatsu! Kyoui no King Punch
episodes.plot: With Hack defeated and the remaining fighters reduced to 24, the battle royale is nearly over. Bellamy faces off Bartolomeo while at the same time Blue Gilly defeats Ricky.

episodes.title: Tougyo Shuurai! Shi no Tekkyou o Toppa Seyo
episodes.plot: Bartolomeo wins block B. Law, Usopp and Robin prepare to cross the bridge but are attacked by a school of Fighting Fish.

episodes.title: Bouken! Yousei no Shima Green Bit
episodes.plot: Upon their arrival to Green Bit, the group discovers a Marine ship that crashed and believed that the Marines had landed on the island. Robin and Usopp begin to scout the island as Law takes Caesar to the meeting point.

episodes.title: Shirarezaru Sekai Tontatta Oukoku
episodes.plot: Robin found herself captured by dwarves after they knocked her and Usopp unconscious. At the Colosseum, the C block battle royale has started, and Luffy is excited to win this for the prize.

episodes.title: Seiki no Bouryaku: Doflamingo Ugoku
episodes.plot: Sanji learns the truth about what happens before their arrival in Dressrosa and warns Law to get out of Green Bit. Unfortunately, it was too late as the Marines, Issho, and Doflamingo get to the exchange point as well.

episodes.title: Tenchi Yurugasu! Taishou Fujitora no Jitsuryoku
episodes.plot: Admiral Issho and Donquixote Doflamingo prepare to fight Trafalgar Law, who is trying to stall them long enough for the Straw Hat Pirates to accomplish their missions. In the Colosseum, Luffy tames the Fighting Bull.

episodes.title: Ikari no Ichigeki! Kyojin vs Lucy
episodes.plot: The Straw Hat Pirates on-board the Thousand Sunny find themselves in a predicament as they are under attack by the Donquixote Pirates lead by Giolla who transformed the crew as well as the ship into abstract art.

episodes.title: Hakai-hou Sakuretsu! Lucy Kikiippatsu
episodes.plot: The battle Colosseum heats up as more fighters continue to drop one after another and the strongest and most infamous fighters begin to face each other.

episodes.title: Densetsu no Kaizoku - Don Chinjao!
episodes.plot: The final two competitors of Block C, Lucy (Luffy) and Don Chinjao clash with conquerors Haki.

episodes.title: Hikari to Kage - Dressrosa ni Hisomu Yami!
episodes.plot: Sanji and Kin'emon are watching Luffy's fight while observing in disguise the numerous marines surrounding the Colosseum waiting to arrest any criminal that exits the stadium.

episodes.title: Shutsugeki - Densetsu no Hero Usoland
episodes.plot: Usopp, Robin and their dwarf allies are preparing for battle with the Donquixote Pirates to rescue their 500 captured dwarf comrades.

episodes.title: Gekisen Kecchaku! Lucy VS Chinjao!
episodes.plot: Luffy's battle with Chinjao rages forward as they both use Busoshoku Haki in the ongoing fight.

episodes.title: Luffy to Shukumei no Ken Toushi Rebecca
episodes.plot: As Luffy leaves the ring after winning Block C of the tournament, he is attacked by Cavendish. Bartolomeo reveals his connection to Luffy, and Chinjao attempts to thank Luffy for restoring his head.

episodes.title: Mamorinuku! Rebecca to Omocha no Heitai
episodes.plot: Rebbecca's mother leaves her in the Flower Field to go back to town and bring back foot but is killed in the process. The Thunder Soldier carries her mother back and promising that he will protect her forever.

episodes.title: Saigo no Chou Gekisen Ku - D Block Kaisen
episodes.plot: Block D begins their battle in the Corrida Colosseum. As Rebecca enters the arena, she is taunted by the crowd.

episodes.title: Kessen! Joura vs Mugiwara no Ichimi
episodes.plot: At Green Bit, Doflamingo reveals the founding of the World Government and informs Law that the royal family that ruled Dressrosa before the Riku Family was the Donquixote Family.

episodes.title: Yoshiken! Hakuba no Cavendish
episodes.plot: In the Corrida Colosseum, the battle of Block D continues as Cavendish and Rebecca defeat several opponents.

episodes.title: Dai Kessen! Sanji VS Doflamingo
episodes.plot: Sanji attacks Doflamingo but is defeated and saved by Law who brings him back to the Thousand Sunny. With Caesar Clown back in their control, Law orders the Straw Hats to head to Zou immediately.

episodes.title: Rebecca no Shi no Ken! Haisui no Kenbu
episodes.plot: Trafalgar Law and Donquixote Doflamingo begin their duel with a bang on the iron bridge while the escaped Straw Hats are already on their way to Zou.

episodes.title: Saikyou no Senshi! Logan vs Rebecca
episodes.plot: Bartolomeo searches for Luffy while he stumbles upon the infirmary with the losers of Block C. In the Colosseum, the crowd continues taunting the talented Rebecca.

episodes.title: Shougeki! Omocha no Heitai no Shoutai!
episodes.plot: After some conversation, Ricky reveals himself to be Riku Doldo III, the former king of Dressrosa and Rebecca's grandfather. In the flower fields, Gancho reveals the cruelty of the Donquixote Family from 800 years ago.

episodes.title: Senritsu no Kako! Dressrosa no Himitsu
episodes.plot: While the fight for block D continues, Thunder Soldier explains to the Straw Hat Pirates how King Riku lost the throne and respect of Dressrosa.

episodes.title: Akumu! Dressrosa Higeki no Ichiya
episodes.plot: While Doflamingo continues to control Riku Doldo III, his subordinates manage to take control of the castle with the help of an inside spy, who also took princess Viola hostage.

episodes.title: Shichibukai Taiketsu Law VS Doflamingo
episodes.plot: While Admiral Fujitora arrives at the shores of Dressrosa, there is a big ruckus in the city, with explosions and buildings being cut in half. Doflamingo finishes his fight with Law, shooting him three times.

episodes.title: Ryouyuu Aimamieru! Mugiwara to Ten Yasha
episodes.plot: Admiral Fujitora and the Marines prevent Zoro from saving Law. A mysterious figure appears in the Colosseum.

episodes.title: Luffy Kyougaku: Ace no Ishi o Tsugu Otoko
episodes.plot: Bartolomeo saves Bellamy from Dellinger who is called to guard the Toy House. Thunder Soldiers explains "Operation SOP". As Luffy looks for the Colosseum's exit, he is approached by Sabo.

episodes.title: SOP Sakusen Kaishi: Usoland Totsugeki
episodes.plot: At the Flower Field, the Dwarf army and the Straw Hats begin to move out, with Franky taking the front entrance via the toy house while the rest of the army take the secret underground tunnel that leads to the harbor.

episodes.title: Atsuki Omoi - Rebecca vs. Suleiman
episodes.plot: The Colosseum D block battle is almost over with nearly 30 fighters remaining with Rebecca among them.

episodes.title: Shousha Kettei!? D Block Shougeki no Ketsumatsu
episodes.plot: The last standing fighter is revealed to be Rebecca, making her the winner, much to the dissatisfaction of the disbelieving audience.

episodes.title: Taishou no Ketsudan - Fujitora vs. Doflamingo
episodes.plot: Viola shows Luffy's group a secret emergency lift, and the group boards it. In the Toy House, the battle between Franky and Senor Pink rages on, but they are then interrupted by the Marines.

episodes.title: Kesshou Kaishi: Eiyuu Diamante Toujou
episodes.plot: The contenders of the final round, Burgess, Bartolomeo, Lucy, Rebecca, and Diamante make their way in the Colosseum. Doflamingo questions why Luffy is in the tower when he should be in the Colosseum.

episodes.title: Ugoku Shiro! Saikou Kanbu Pica Shutsugen
episodes.plot: Luffy, Zoro and Viola make their way up the castle where they encounter Pica. At the Toy House, the Marines continue attacking Franky.

episodes.title: Ryuu no Tsume Sakuretsu! Lucy Kyoui no Ichigeki!
episodes.plot: Leo prepares to plant the Tatababasco grape in Sugar's bowl. Meanwhile, Kin'emon disguises himself to elude the Donquixote Pirates while Zoro has Luffy and Viola move on while he fights Pica.

episodes.title: Tatou Sugar: Kodomo no Heitai Totsugeki!
episodes.plot: Zoro's battle with Pica continues as Luffy and Viola move forward. Meanwhile, the tower elevator makes it to the palace first floor as Lao G continues to attack Thunder Soldier.

episodes.title: Saigo no Hikari: Warera ga Taichou no Himitsu!
episodes.plot: While the situation of the rebellion is getting more and more critical, Leo reveals to Usopp an important secret about their captain and the reason why their plan must not fail.

episodes.title: Panku Ningen: Gladius Dai Bakuhatsu!
episodes.plot: Thunder Soldier, Kabu and Rampo progress through the castle. In the trading port, Leo tries once again to poison Sugar but her toys attack him and the dwarf army.

episodes.title: Usotsuki Usoland Tousouchuu!
episodes.plot: Usopp gives up on running and decides to fight for the dwarf army, attacking Trebol with a Shuriken Star.

episodes.title: Unmei no Deai: Kyros to Riku Ou
episodes.plot: Usopp faces Trebol, the Thunder Soldier recalls his time as Kyros. After much time as a gladiator, Kyros manages to become King Riku's captain of his guard and later marries his eldest daughter Scarlett and they together conceive Rebecca.

episodes.title: Sakusen Shippai! Eiyuu Usoland Shisu!?
episodes.plot: Ten years ago, when Dressrosa is attacked by the Donquixote Pirates, Kyros rushes to the palace to see what's happening. He is ambushed by the pirates and chained to the ground as Doflamingo presents himself.
